title: Drawing, "Drawing. Sketches.  Sky, Jamaica, West Indies.  Similar to -338.  A, B. Views of the Blue Mountain.  C. Coast and Sky.", July 1865
markings: Stamped in ink at lower right:  Lugt 457c
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at lower center:  Blue mountain peak; and at lower right:  Dead ferns / whitish silver trees / near Salloway Hill / July // 65 Jamaica

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at center:  view looking East
description: Horizontal oblique view into a valley with bushes and trees standing on a slope in the right foreground and with two peaks rising from the mountain range in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing. Sketches.  Sky, Jamaica, West Indies.  Similar to -338.  A, B. Views of the Blue Mountain.  C. Coast and Sky.", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-392-b.
